comment._content: Edgar Truman Brackett (1853-1924), Senator from New York: www.onlinebiographies.info/ny/sara/brackett-et.htm A Hiram R. Wood (not Vood) was an active NY Democrat who ran for the House of Representatives in 1920. Might could be this guy.

comment._content: The steps in the background probably are those of the New York State Capitol, in Albany.
